review: Whatever i mentioned above is not correct i had to do that as that were Mandatory fields. We had an appointment with doc at 10.30 am and we reqched there in time but doc was not available. We waited for an hour and come back and we have not been given any other time slot rather we have been told jab doc aa jaayenge tau bata denge and he will be in the hospital by 3 pm.  Finally we couldnt see the doc. There might be some issue that doc didnt turn so this is not at all against the Doc, however Hospital staff must have provided the next appointment. It was not good experience with practo at all. Please see below.

I visited doctor on Saturday he advise some medicine seeing the report . He did some change in the medication carried on based on diabetic condition. To my surprise, the next day in Sunday we have to visit EMERGENCY. ** *** **** ******* *** **** *** **** *** *** ********* ************ ***** *** ******* *** ****** ***** **** ***** It put question mark on the seriousness of the doctor with the doctor. 

He is good with his words only  what I experience.
